snippet: The Boko Haram militant group descended on the town of Gamboru Ngala this week, firing indiscriminately, torching houses and killing at least 336 people.
abstract: Islamist insurgents kill hundreds in town in Nigeria's northeast, as more than 200 schoolgirls abducted by militants, known as Boko Haram, remain missing.
lead_paragraph: The Boko Haram militant group descended on the town of Gamboru Ngala this week, firing indiscriminately, torching houses and killing at least 336 people.

headline.main: Islamist Militants Kill Hundreds of Civilians in Northeastern Nigeria
headline.print_headline: Islamist Militants Kill Hundreds of Civilians in Northeastern Nigeria
